The default SSID pattern appears to be '''SONIC-XXXX''', where '''XXXX''' appears :to be the last two octets of the BSSID (lower case hex digits).
This device uses a [[Qualcomm]] MDM8220 modem. {{See also|Huawei UMG587|Huawei E587u-5}}
